titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation to restraine the vnlawfull transportation of hides and leather.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Contains ilustrated initial showing Neptune and two seahorses.
"Giuen at His Maiesties Court at White-hall the 14. day of December, in the second yeere of his Maiesties Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
